title: rybako
author: rybako
content: I'm a certified meme coin hunter, and my radar is always on the lookout for those hidden gems that might become the next Pepe. Speaking of which, I remember stumbling upon Pepe on Twitter when the buzz and sentiment were off the charts, and I just couldn't resist aping in, and it paid off!Twitter is just one of the treasure troves, but there are plenty of other ways to spot those potential success stories. So, my fellow crypto meme seekers, I want to hear your strategies. How do you go about discovering those up-and-coming meme coins before they skyrocket? Care to share your secret sauce?

comments.author: btc_angela
comments.body: Quote from: rybako on July 28, 2023, 08:49:02 AMI'm a certified meme coin hunter, and my radar is always on the lookout for those hidden gems that might become the next Pepe. Speaking of which, I remember stumbling upon Pepe on Twitter when the buzz and sentiment were off the charts, and I just couldn't resist aping in, and it paid off!Twitter is just one of the treasure troves, but there are plenty of other ways to spot those potential success stories. So, my fellow crypto meme seekers, I want to hear your strategies. How do you go about discovering those up-and-coming meme coins before they skyrocket? Care to share your secret sauce?I'm not hunting on meme coins like Pepe, but I do agree that Twitter is one social media that you might find new meme coins on the horizon as obviously they need to get the word out and Twitter is one of the best social media that we have today.Not sure, maybe reddit could also be a good source of meme coin hunting, or 4chan perhaps. Because I remember that there are a lot of developers who uses 4chan before. Or at least uses that as medium to spread the word.

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: rybako on July 28, 2023, 08:49:02 AMRe: How do you find new meme coins early?it is better not to look for and better not to talk about this shameful trend for the entire crypto market. Shameful, because it caused huge capital to be directed to the pockets of scammers, rugpull specialists, instead of directing it to innovative projects and new technologies. This ridicules crypto investors and diminishes the new technologies that are being created here.And when it comes to potential gains, you always have to look at the risk/reward. Maybe finding a new PEPE gives you a potential profit of x1000 (if you wont take profit earlier), but the chance are 1:10,000 or less.

comments.author: RiverBoy
comments.body: Information is very powerful and profitable when you utilize the opportunity of getting the information and do the needful, see you're self swimming in the cryptocurrency industries market. Base on the question you asked here on thread, it requires adequate research through Twitter handle and also at early stage listen in coinmarketcap or coin gecko, check on the new list coin and make your research, before investing your hard earned money.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: It does not lie in the meme coin, but it has become an old investment, and the noise around it is pump and dump, so it is difficult to know when its price will rise. One million dollars may lead to significant changes in the currency's price.It is true that Twitter is your favorite place, but Reddit is a good platform to learn about coins, and searching for new coins that are listed in CoinMarketCap will give you more details.Quote from: rybako on July 28, 2023, 08:49:02 AMI'm a certified meme coin hunter, and my radar is always on the lookout for those hidden gems that might become the next Pepe. Speaking of which, I remember stumbling upon Pepe on Twitter when the buzz and sentiment were off the charts, and I just couldn't resist aping in, and it paid off!By "certified" what do you mean, is there any certification for meme hunters now?

comments.author: 20kevin20
comments.body: You’ll pretty much need mostly Twitter and Telegram. You’ll find out about all sorts of shitcoins over there. There’s a bigger underlaying issue though - you’ll need to spend a ton of time to find out about new coins and separate the good from the bad ones. Memecoins are like gambling, only very few succeed and even that’s mostly temporary. For now, the only truly successful memecoin is Doge. The others need to pass the test of time which, frankly, is pretty harsh and hard to pass. I expect most memecoins to be gone in a matter of months or years. New ones will come up, the previous gones will go.

comments.author: Yamifoud
comments.body: Well, you are too lucky because Pepe accidentally had pump. I'd accidentally because it was unusual to happen to projects that don't have any market contribution. Meme coins are shitcoins - a sad reality. If you are too lucky these days OP but I will tell you that it was hard to believe for another meme coin to soar high like Pepe and Shiba Inu. I would say that stop focusing on finding them because you will only find it regretful instead, have your time spent wisely looking for potential coins, not on hyped and scam projects.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Same I think Twitter is the best place to hunt meme and use some signal on telegram bot that has notification on new launch project. If you knew how to use some sites that scan smart contract much better. Cause youll see if those contracts are safe to ape in.You need lots of tools so you can safely win some meme coin if you are gonna do a degen space trading. 10 tries on some shitcoin surely 1 or 2 of that are gonna moon somehow with the use of researching and some momentum with hype.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: Quote from: rybako on July 28, 2023, 08:49:02 AMI'm a certified meme coin hunter, and my radar is always on the lookout for those hidden gems that might become the next Pepe. Speaking of which, I remember stumbling upon Pepe on Twitter when the buzz and sentiment were off the charts, and I just couldn't resist aping in, and it paid off!Twitter is just one of the treasure troves, but there are plenty of other ways to spot those potential success stories. So, my fellow crypto meme seekers, I want to hear your strategies. How do you go about discovering those up-and-coming meme coins before they skyrocket? Care to share your secret sauce?I think it's still twitter but in my own opinion I guess that will be private groups either on telegram or discord. I'm following those twitter accounts that probably sharing alpha of these meme coins and the strategy to check wallets that are aping on meme or other tokens that may get trending. Regarding this one (checking wallets), I guess it's still twitter to look out for, there are lot of threadoors out there that share this strategy.

comments.author: abel1337
comments.body: Quote from: rybako on July 28, 2023, 08:49:02 AMI'm a certified meme coin hunter, and my radar is always on the lookout for those hidden gems that might become the next Pepe. Speaking of which, I remember stumbling upon Pepe on Twitter when the buzz and sentiment were off the charts, and I just couldn't resist aping in, and it paid off!Twitter is just one of the treasure troves, but there are plenty of other ways to spot those potential success stories. So, my fellow crypto meme seekers, I want to hear your strategies. How do you go about discovering those up-and-coming meme coins before they skyrocket? Care to share your secret sauce?Not really interested in that meme coins. Meme coins is just about the chance of making you rich and only driven the hope of being a protagonist on a success story. Meme coin hype is slowly degrading and I don't think people (masses) has still guts to invest on meme coin given t hat a lot of  newbies are always on a loss on these meme coins. Meme coin really attracts newbies because on how high the possible return that can go back to you but the risk is the same and newbies don't really realize it. I'm not bashing you OP. It's just my thoughts about meme coins.

comments.author: tsaroz
comments.body: Quote from: rybako on July 28, 2023, 08:49:02 AMI'm a certified meme coin hunter, and my radar is always on the lookout for those hidden gems that might become the next Pepe. Speaking of which, I remember stumbling upon Pepe on Twitter when the buzz and sentiment were off the charts, and I just couldn't resist aping in, and it paid off!Twitter is just one of the treasure troves, but there are plenty of other ways to spot those potential success stories. So, my fellow crypto meme seekers, I want to hear your strategies. How do you go about discovering those up-and-coming meme coins before they skyrocket? Care to share your secret sauce?As you said already, Twitter activity is what I too look first. Other metrics I consider are the overall presentation. The plans and roadmaps. Projects with low effort are highly unlikely to success. A well thought out project stands out when you visit it's site and look at the roadmap. Other thing to consider is the overall community and organic participation of the members.Coinmarketcaps community tab too is now a good place to watch what people are talking about.

comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: Quote from: rybako on July 28, 2023, 08:49:02 AMTwitter is just one of the treasure troves, but there are plenty of other ways to spot those potential success stories. So, my fellow crypto meme seekers, I want to hear your strategies. How do you go about discovering those up-and-coming meme coins before they skyrocket? Care to share your secret sauce?You are right that twitter is very good source of information regarding what’s hot since it’s the most popular social media channel to promote shitcoin but since it’s the most popular makes it dangerous place too since scammer use this platform to spread their scam project. It’s a pros and cons.I usually use dextools on checking newly created meme tokens then watch for the liquidity to build up. This is a safe sign that there’s a demand building on a token instead of relying on social media that is full of fraud and scammer promoting their scam tokens. On Dextools, you can guarantee that all data is legit.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: rybako on July 28, 2023, 08:49:02 AMHow do you go about discovering those up-and-coming meme coins before they skyrocket? Care to share your secret sauce?TBH, I'm not a person who likes looking for memecoins, but based on my past experience when I'm looking for memecoins to invest, I usually look for them on Twitter, because Twitter is the main place where they are promoted. Apart from that, I also follow several calls channel on Telegram, some of them are Venom Calls and Caesar Calls.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: Quote from: rybako on July 28, 2023, 08:49:02 AMI'm a certified meme coin hunter, and my radar is always on the lookout for those hidden gems that might become the next Pepe. Speaking of which, I remember stumbling upon Pepe on Twitter when the buzz and sentiment were off the charts, and I just couldn't resist aping in, and it paid off!That hype was coming after elon was mentioning pepe on his twitter account. It was bringing the hype for pepe token. Milady has also the same case as pepe. It was not growting due to the fundamental, but it's flying high due to the elon's tweet. Elon's tweet was driving so many people to speculate the future of this meme token. It's the same story as doge coin in the past. I don't even need to find that, but elon gonna find it for me. It's really stupid if you were buying meme token without being hyped by elon first. The key is you shall buy token that will be mentioned by elon. That's it. Quote from: rybako on July 28, 2023, 08:49:02 AMTwitter is just one of the treasure troves, but there are plenty of other ways to spot those potential success stories. So, my fellow crypto meme seekers, I want to hear your strategies. How do you go about discovering those up-and-coming meme coins before they skyrocket? Care to share your secret sauce?There's no good strategy to hunt new meme token because almost all of meme tokens were scam. I will be stupid enough to buy any meme tokens in the market. The only strategy to keep update with elon's tweet through use my personal notification for elon's tweet.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Quote from: rybako on July 28, 2023, 08:49:02 AMI'm a certified meme coin hunter, and my radar is always on the lookout for those hidden gems that might become the next Pepe. Speaking of which, I remember stumbling upon Pepe on Twitter when the buzz and sentiment were off the charts, and I just couldn't resist aping in, and it paid off!Twitter is just one of the treasure troves, but there are plenty of other ways to spot those potential success stories. So, my fellow crypto meme seekers, I want to hear your strategies. How do you go about discovering those up-and-coming meme coins before they skyrocket? Care to share your secret sauce?Certified? Who certifies? Also not to offend you but I do view memecoins as good tokens only at its start 'coz most of its market prices are falling eventually. Also, not all meme tokens are having good outcome in this industry simply because of its laack of utility which we all know, is needed to sustain its market value. But yes, if you could determine which one qoyld be best to buy early and has the potential to be bigger after its release in the market, then that would be a huge advantage. However, problem is determining one. Everythings dependent with hype and demand for meme tokens and that means even if a certain one has a good team behind, if majority of investors does not think it would be the best one, then demand would still be low.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Define early? If you want to be one of the first with microcaps go to dextools and pick a winner. Changes are that there are no winners at that time and everything you choose is a rug. I've found some interesting projects from there that weren't scams and made 100x and over to me. But changes to find them require luck and lots of work to study them all.Or just pick randomly stuff that people are shilling to you. Good luck with the hunting

comments.author: AakZaki
comments.body: When you find Pepe and you survive from start to finish, then you are a lucky person and get lots of benefits. But if you still ask other radars, yes there are many ways you can do it, one of them is by looking at websites like Dextool, dexscreen which will display new coins when they are created. But somehow they hype and suddenly become a conversation. this is also because of the strong community so see how they have a valid community, clear developers and how much LP they lock. this will indeed be very complicated and still unclear, but keep monitoring on twitter for more accurate information.

comments.author: el kaka22
comments.body: I do not invest into meme projects at all, so I can't tell you what I have "done", I do not have that past. But as everyone knows, it is following launchpads that make it the best way. All those meme projects care about making it their point to profit, and that means we are going to end up seeing something that worths something in the end, and that's why it is quite important to feel like you are going to profit as much as you possibly could.Obviously it is going to take some time, but that doesn't mean that it is going to be easy, so focus on what you can do instead. I personally just look at launchpads for other stuff, but see a lot of meme projects there all the time and people fund them, and that's how they find them.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: To find the best meme coins early monitor social media, forums & cryptocurrency communities. Explore coin listings on exchanges for new meme coin opportunities. Visit official websites of meme coins for presale info.You can use crypto market aggregators like CoinCodex to find new meme coins early. Then you can analyse their on chain activity through tools like Etherscan, DEXTools & DeBank. It’s usually a good idea to check social media platforms like Twitter to evaluate the meme coin’s community

comments.author: ananyabushra
comments.body: I usually follow some Telegram channels where they share different memecoins every day. I'm not sure where they get them from, but I get those from them
